task.title: Verifying network IP addresses after appliance restore by using the
task.shortdesc: System administrators can use the view and amend, if necessary, the network interface IP addresses of configuration items on the appliance after it has been restored.

context.p:
In the time between creating a backup of your appliance and restoring, and if you have specified Appliance=False in the imaserver restore command, it is possible for the network interface IP addresses of the following configuration items to have changed:
Endpoints
Web UI host
SNMP agent If the IP addresses have changed since the creation of the backup, you must amend them so that the restored appliance can operate correctly. Amend the IP addresses to the values that were configured at the time of the backup operation.
